item.title: A Primer on Observability for Dynamic Organizations — Part 1
item.description: A introduction to the buzzword and the rationale for implementing it What is Observability? Before we dive in to the waters, we need to define what observability is. Let’s go for some tweets first. Monitoring is for operating software/systems Instrumentation is for writing software Observability is for understanding systems — Charity Majors (@mipsytipsy) September 23, 2017 That’s Charity Majors, a well known voice on Observability and someone who has built a business doing it well.
